price: Kun qajeelaa haala ta’een karaa Gooftaa keetiiti. Ummata gorfamaniif mallattoo dhugaadhaan adda baafneerra.
arabic: وَهَٰذَا صِرَٰطُ رَبِّكَ مُسۡتَقِيمٗاۗ قَدۡ فَصَّلۡنَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَذَّكَّرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wahādhā ṣirāṭu rabbika mus'taqīman qad faṣṣalnā al-āyāti liqawmin yadhakkarūna
